flawed_nl_solution:
She has 2 dogs and it takes 20 minutes to groom just 1 dog so it takes her 2*20 = <<2*20=40>>40 minutes per day to groom 2 dogs
In 30 days, she will have spent 30*40 = <<30*40=2100>>2100 minutes grooming her dogs
There are 60 minutes in an hour so she spends 2100/60 = <<2100/60=35>>35 hours grooming her dogs
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 2100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
